caption.p:
( A and B) The projected (111) and (001) surface Brillouin zones (SBZs) on which some of the high-symmetry k points are indicated. ( C) Schematic illustration of the gapped surface states due to the double band inversions without the
C
2
protection as discussed in the text. ( D and E) Band spectrum for (111) and (001) surfaces, respectively. The green dotted lines show the Rashba bands due to the double band inversions.
